info.name: Estufar's Tumblr fixes
info.description:
My own fixes to Tumblr. Removes stuff I don't use, makes the header prettier, makes the notifications red again, and maybe even more. I'll try to keep this up to date since I do use it myself, but who knows how busy I am.
This user style sure works well with my XKit extension to bring back the side menu
info.additionalInfo: 2016-12-20 - Tumblr changed how they display their logo, so I changed how I changed the logo 2015-11-04 - Re-added borders around asks after Tumblr decided removing them was a good idea 2015-08-12 - Removed recommended posts. Not sure if I hadn't removed it before or if Tumblr changed something but they're gone now 2015-07-31 - Changed the color of the url back to light grey when reblogging too 2015-07-27 - Changed back the colors on people's urls on posts to the lighter grey 2015-05-13 - Removed post it forward button 2015-05-06 - Tumblr changed the code for their logo slightly which broke the logo part of my style. That's been fixed 2015-05-05 - Removed recommendations after posts are liked 2015-05-05 - Removed yet another type of ad 2015-04-16 - Removed notification-style ads 2015-04-08 - Restored old logo, removed the line under the header again, made header fixed width 2015-04-01 - Stop pointlessly cutting off urls 2015-03-31 - Removed some ads and the explore trending post types 2015-03-01 - Removed recommended blogs 2015-02-22 - Removed the save the Internet button, reverted heading styles to the non-clickbait font 2015-02-20 - Removed the discover, compose, explore, and search buttons, the links in the bottom right, and the ads that aren't yet removed by other styles and tweaks. Also removes the line under the header and centers it vertically in the space where the line used to be. Makes the notifications red too. Also fixes some weird thing where on some posts where hovering over the post causes it to become shorter.
